snippet: The Giants, who have one of the league’s top kickers, Josh Brown, have brought the highly regarded rookie Brandon McManus into camp in an open competition for the position.
abstract: New York Giants, who have one of the league’s top kickers in Josh Brown, have brought highly regarded rookie Brandon McManus into camp in an open competition for the position.
lead_paragraph: The Giants, who have one of the league’s top kickers, Josh Brown, have brought the highly regarded rookie Brandon McManus into camp in an open competition for the position.

headline.seo: Giants Kickers Josh Brown and Rookie Brandon McManus Competing in Camp
headline.main: Strong-Legged Kickers Put Giants in a Quandary, and It’s Good
headline.print_headline: Strong-Legged Kickers Put Giants in a Quandary, and It’s Good
